events.summary: The Trump EPA announced plans to end a program requiring polluters to report greenhouse gas emissions, calling it bureaucratic red tape. The program has been in place for 15 years.
events.title: EPA Ends Greenhouse Gas Reporting Program

events.summary: Former President Donald Trump has reportedly amassed troops in Washington DC, raising concerns about the potential use of military force against civilian protests. This development comes amid large-scale protests in the city, with demonstrators expressing opposition to Trump's actions and policies. The presence of armed troops has been perceived as an intimidation tactic, potentially infringing on the right to peaceful assembly and protest.
events.title: Trump Amasses Troops in Washington DC

events.why_relevant: The deployment of troops in response to civilian protests threatens the democratic right to peaceful assembly and could escalate tensions.
